about_the_game:
Helen in Hell is a bullet hell game, which is NOT A ROGUELIKE, where you, as the angel Helen, will dash-dodge & fight your way through waves of themed enemies. Unlocking new weapons, abilities and power levels to help you defeat the 4 unique bosses at the end of each dungeon. Defeating all four will unlock Nightmare Mode bosses for the ultimate test of your bullet hell skills.

Dungeons & Unique Bosses to defeat

  • Themed dungeons with unique mob enemies

  • Dungeon bosses each with 10+ different attacks. Bosses will choose from their pool of abilities randomly to keep you on your toes every battle.

  • Defeat all Dungeons to unlock Nightmare Mode bosses with 10+ more attacks each. A very hard version of the bosses to test your timing, skill and precision.

    Mix & Match New Abilities


    Unlock powerful new abilities to help you fight the forces of evil, such as Holy Swords that will circle around the player and constantly deal damage to enemies that they hit. Equip multiple to mix and match what best fits your playstyle

    Unlock New Weapons


    Starting from a single shot, unlock more powerful weapons as you progress through the dungeons.

    • Weapons: Unlock the Shotgun, Sniper & Boom launcher. Pick your favorite and use it to slay your enemies

  • Collect Loot: Enemies will drop coins which you can use to purchase your power level upgrades making you faster, stronger, deadlier. Health drops will help you survive longer

  • Pick Up and Play: Built with quick play in mind we put save points so that your progress is never wasted. Get right into the action quickly and battle for as long or short time as you want.

  • Saved Progression: Your unlocks and power level upgrades are never lost. In defeat, Helen picks herself up and tries again.

  • Precise Control: Directional aim and active firing, coupled with Helens dash-dodge mechanic means your skills of timing and ability will be tested.
